briefdescription.para: load POLYR from RBDY3 or MAILx and initialize existing_entites

detaileddescription.para: python usage : POLYR_LoadTactors()

briefdescription.para: Get the color of a given POLYR.

detaileddescription.para:
python usage : color = POLYR_GetContactorColor(itacty)
itacty
(integer) : rank of POLYR
color (string) : the color of the POLYR itact

briefdescription.para: write position of vertex in a file

detaileddescription.para: python usage : POLYR_SaveVertex()

briefdescription.para: apply an amplification/reduction size factor

detaileddescription.para:
python usage : POLYR_ModifyRadius(ratio)
ratio
(real) : ratio factor
ratio
(double) : ratio factor

briefdescription.para: define the threshold between a plain and a big polyr. big polyr are such that radius > threshold*mean_radius. default threshold = 4. Must be defined before the load of tactors.

detaileddescription.para:
python usage : POLYR_SetThresholdBigPolyr(ratio)
ratio
(real) : ratio factor
ratio
(double) : ratio factor

briefdescription.para: impose explicitly that an object is big. Must be set after the load of tactors.

detaileddescription.para:
python usage : POLYR_SetBigPolyr(itacty)
itacty
(integer) : rank of the polyr
itacty
(int) : rank of the polyr

briefdescription.para: impose explicitly the number of big POLYR. Must be set after the load of tactors.

detaileddescription.para:
python usage : POLYR_SetNbBigPolyr(nb)
nb
(integer) : number of polyr
number
(int) : number of polyr

briefdescription.para: skip the topological decomposition of a big POLYR. its surface is considered as a soup of triangle. usefull with complicated surface using Cundall CP detection

detaileddescription.para: python usage : POLYR_SkipTopoBigPolyr()

briefdescription.para: disable automatic reorientation (which works only with convex POLYR).

detaileddescription.para: python usage : POLYR_SkipAutomaticReorientation()
Disable the automatic reorientation of normals performed by lmgc90. This is necessary when using non-convex objects.

briefdescription.para: disable Half-Edge structure generation (HE is necessary for non convex contact detection)

detaileddescription.para: python usage : POLYR_SkipHEBuild()
Disable the Half-Edge structure generation performed by lmgc90. This is necessary when testing the import of strange object.

briefdescription.para: set the maximum angle (between 0 and 180 degree) threshold between 2 elements to declare them as belonging to the same topological face

detaileddescription.para: python usage : POLYR_TopologyAngle(angle)

briefdescription.para: set the maximum angle (between 0 and 180 degree) variation between elements of a topological face to declare it as flat

detaileddescription.para: python usage : POLYR_FlatnessAngle(angle)

memberdef.argsstring: (int ivalue1, double angle, double **matrix_out, int *dim1, int *dim2, int **pointer_out2, int *length2)
memberdef.name: POLYR_GetWireframe

briefdescription.para: Get wireframe of a POLYR.

detaileddescription.para:
python usage : coor,connectivity = POLYR_GetWireframe(itacty, angle)
itacty
(integer) : rank of the POLYR
angle
(double) : threshold angle to skip some nodes on boundary of faces of the POLYR
coor (double array) : reference on the coor vector seen as a numpy array of size [nb_point,3] connectivity (integer array) : reference on the connectivity vector seen as a numpy array

briefdescription.para: Get the outline of a POLYR in almost current configuration.

detaileddescription.para: If the POLYR is a real POLYR the current position of the center of the POLYR is used but the local frame for the orientation is the on in detection configuration.
If the POLYR is in fact a POLYD the current position of nodes of the mesh are used.

usage : vertex = POLYR_GetVertex(itacty)
itacty
(integer) : rank of considered POLYR
vertex (double 2D-array) : the coordinates of the vertices

briefdescription.para: Get a pointer on the outline of a POLYR in detection configuration.

detaileddescription.para:
usage : vertex = POLYR_GetPtrVertexTT(itacty)
itacty
(integer) : rank of considered POLYR
vertex (double 2D-array) : the coordinates of the vertices

briefdescription.para: Get a pointer on the outline of a POLYR in detection configuration - be carefull to move polyr.

detaileddescription.para:
usage : normal = POLYR_GetPtrNormalTT(itacty)
itacty
(integer) : rank of considered POLYR
normal (double 2D-array) : the coordinates of the vertices

briefdescription.para: move the polyr in the configuration TT ; mandatory to get the wireframe in deformed configuration

detaileddescription.para: python usage : POLYR_MoveToConfigurationTT()

briefdescription.para: Get a copy of map POLYR2bdyty.

detaileddescription.para:
usage : polyr2bdyty = POLYR_GetPOLYR2BDYTY()
polyr2bdyty (integer 2D-array) : the polyr2bdyty map

briefdescription.para: Get a pointer on map POLYR2bdyty.

detaileddescription.para:
usage : polyr2bdyty = POLYR_GetPtrPOLYR2BDYTY()
polyr2bdyty (integer 2D-array) : a pointer in the polyr2bdyty map

briefdescription.para: return if a given contactor is attached to a visible body

detaileddescription.para:
python usage : visible = POLYR_IsVisible(itacty)
itacty
(integer) : id of the contactor we want visibility
visible (integer) : 1 if body is visible, 0 else

briefdescription.para: Get the number of POLYR.

detaileddescription.para: python usage : nb_POLYR = POLYR_GetNbPOLYR()

briefdescription.para: Get a reference on the outlines of all POLYR.

detaileddescription.para:
usage : outlines = POLYR_InitOutlines()
outlines (double array) : a reference on outlines_POLYR

briefdescription.para: Get a reference on the scalar fields of all POLYR.

detaileddescription.para:
usage : scalarfields = POLYR_InitScalarfields()
scalarfields (double array) : reference on scalarfields_POLYR array

briefdescription.para: Update values of outlines_POLYR and scalarfields_POLYR pointers.

detaileddescription.para: usage : POLYR_UpdatePostdata()

briefdescription.para: Get the list of cumulated outline points number.

detaileddescription.para:
python usage : nb_pointOutlines = POLYR_GetNbPointOutlines()
nb_pointOutlines (integer array) : the cumulated number of outline points of the POLYR

briefdescription.para: Get the number of scalar fields of a POLYR.

detaileddescription.para:
python usage : nb_scalarfields = POLYR_GetNbScalarFields()
nb_scalarfields (integer) : the number of scalar fields of a POLYR

briefdescription.para: Get a reference on the connectivities of all POLYR.

detaileddescription.para:
usage : connec = POLYR_GetPtrAllConnectivities()
connec (integer array) : a reference on all_connectivities

briefdescription.para: Get a reference on the connectivity of one POLYR.

detaileddescription.para:
usage : connec = POLYR_GetPtrConnectivity(itacty)
itacty
(integer) : POLYR number
connec (integer 2D-array) : reference on connectivity

briefdescription.para: Get the position of the vertices of a POLYR in its inertia frame.

detaileddescription.para:
usage : vertex = POLYR_GetPtrVertexRef(itacty)
itacty
(integer) : rank of considered POLYR
vertex (double 2D-array) : the coordinates of the vertices

briefdescription.para: Get for each face of all POLYR : contactor id, topo id, face id and face status.

detaileddescription.para:
usage : topo_data = POLYR_GetTopoData()
topt_data (int 2D-array) : topology data of all faces of all POLYR

briefdescription.para: Free all memory allocated within POLYR module.

detaileddescription.para: python usage : POLYR_CleanMemory()
